description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Osseins:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Ossein}s, they start battles with {CONDNAME_BUFF_REBIRTH}. In addition, they are resurrected by this buff with 100% {STAT_health}.
name: Sigil of the Ossein
